text: Jane Froman (November 10, 1907 â€“ April 22, 1980) was an American singer and actress. She acted in several movies, such as Kissing Time and Radio City Rebels. She hosted her own television show The Jane Froman Show from 1952 to 1955. In February 1953, Froman was in an airplane crash. She was badly injured and crippled. After this she had to use crutches to walk. Froman was born in the St. Louis suburb of University City, Missouri. She died from cardiac arrest, in Columbia, Missouri. She was aged 72. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Musicians from Missouri Category:Actors from Missouri Category:1907 births Category:1980 deaths
title: Jane Froman
